storage.admin module

storage.apps module

class storage.apps.StorageConfig(app_name, app_module)

Bases: AppConfig

AppConfig class for the ‘storage’ app. This class defines configuration options for the ‘storage’ app. Attributes:

default_auto_field (str): The default auto field for models in this app. name (str): The name of the app.

default_auto_field = 'django.db.models.BigAutoField'
name = 'storage'
ready()

Method called when the app is ready. This method imports signals module to ensure signal handling is set up when the app is ready.
